title: After Rebirth, He Married his Childhood Sweetheart - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
author: 叶飞飞
description:
It was not until the moment when he was dying in a pool of blood when he was in a car accident and looked at Xia Yuchan who was crying hysterically in front of him, and the memories in his mind flashed like a revolving lantern, did Ye Fei realize that someone who loved him deeply and was worthy of cherishing was near. Within easy reach.

At the last moment when his life disappeared, he suddenly remembered the classic line of Zhi Zun Bao.

If God can give me a chance to do it again, I will definitely…

Then, God  really gave a chance, and Ye Fei became a glorious primary school student again.>
